reviewText: Very good cd to learn the shag steps.

In my opinion, this instructional DVD doesn't spend enough time on the basic step which is the foundation for all other steps.  The instructors dance beautifully together but I found their instruction lacking.

This Dvd is not good for a beginner - especially if you are a woman. The "instructors" may be good dancers but they are not good instructors. They do not spend enough time on the basics and barely show the woman's part at all. I am very disappointed.

I bought this because my wife and I went to Charleston SC and were introduced to Shag and beach music - it is a fun way to dance. I hope it makes it up north someday! This DVD is very helpful in teaching the steps.
